pr_title: Use client.rack property in kafka connect

timeline.bodyText: I think the comment is a bit misleading. Maybe it should say something like Configuration of the node label which will be used as the client.rack consumer configuration.?
timeline.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: I think this is not needed if it is the same name as the name in the method.
timeline.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: I do not think we need this if block since the init container should be used only when the rack is configure (and not null). You call it from getInitContainers only when rack is already not null I think.
timeline.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: Should this be called from testGenerateDeploymentWithRack?
timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: I have already the test method with testGenerateDeploymentWithRack name. This is only assertion of the rack specific properties. I couldn't find the better name, and just to be consistent with other methods I use checkRack. Any suggestions ?
replies.author: klalafaryan

replies.bodyText: Never mind this comment. I thought it is never called form testGenerateDeploymentWithRack. But now I see it is called from checkDeployment which is called there. So just ignore this. Sorry.
replies.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: I guess we need to add the Cluster role to the installation files? We will need to add it to install/ and for both Helm Charts.
